title: Ivanti Endpoint Manager GetDBPatchProducts SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Ivanti Endpoint Manager. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the implementation of the GetDBPatchProducts method. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to construct SQL queries. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the service account.
addtionnal_details: Ivanti has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-May-2024?language=en_US
timeline:
2024-04-03 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-05-24 - Coordinated public release of advisory
